product_name: CeraVeEye Repair Cream for Dark Circles & Puffy Under Eyes
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCeraVe Eye Repair Cream for Dark Circles & Puffy Under Eyes visibly reduces the look of dark circles and puffiness, and this gentle eye cream helps restore the skin's barrier with ceramides.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated for delicate skin, this eye cream reduces the appearance of dark circles and eye puffinessFeatures a Marine & Botanical Complex to help brighten the entire eye areaNon-greasy, fast-absorbing formulaHelps restore the skin's protective barrier with ceramidesHelps attract moisture to the skin with hyaluronic acidProvides soothing benefits with niacinamideIdeal for all skin typesHypoallergenic and non-comedogenicOpthalmologist-tested and recognized as safe for use around the eye areaAccepted by the National Eczema AssociationDeveloped with dermatologistsKey IngredientsCeramides help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrierHyaluronic acid attracts hydration to the skin's surface and helps dry skin retain moistureNiacinamide helps calm the skinMarine and Botanical Complex helps reduce the look of dark circles and puffinessMVE Technology, a patented delivery system, continually releases moisturizing ingredientsFormulated WithoutFragranceItem 2269490How To UseApply in small dots around the eye area and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed. Use alone or under makeup once or twice a day in the AM and/or PM.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Niacinamide, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric, Triglyceride, Glycerin, Propanediol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Jojoba Esters, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Asparagopsis Armata Extract, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Potassium Sorbate, Ceramide Eop, Sorbitol, Carbomer, Zinc Citrate, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Triethanolamine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Hydroxide, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil / Sweet Almond Oil, Tocopherol, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract, Laureth-4, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tetrasodium Edta, Maltodextrin, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Chrysanthellum Indicum Extract.
how_to_use: Apply in small dots around the eye area and gently smooth until thoroughly absorbed. Use alone or under makeup once or twice a day in the AM and/or PM.
ingredients: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil / Sweet Almond Oil

reviews.headline: I wanted this to work
reviews.comments: This did absolutely nothing to my under eyes. For context i saw dark circles and kinda like sunken in eye bags so not much puffiness but enough to notice. But either way i used this and it did help or change my appearance. Yes i used as directed and finished the whole thing. I guess the good thing is that it dodnt cause any harm but still! I was skeptical about putting something around my eyes and wondering if it wouod do more harm than good. But nope just didnt work. Which is surprising bc majority of the comments say other wise.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Seems to work pretty well!

reviews.headline: Very Good
reviews.comments: Its a good eye cream but I did not like it as much as some other eye creams I have used.

reviews.headline: It's a no for me
reviews.comments: Was hoping for results, but I just got itchy eyes and irritation.

reviews.headline: Would not repurchase
reviews.comments: I've been using this product every morning & every night since 1/23 I have unfortunately had no change. I was really hoping this product would do as it says but sadly for me it has not. For reference I'm 29 and have had no change in my under eyes since using

reviews.headline: Crave eye cream
reviews.comments: It's to early to tell if this helps the dark circle

reviews.headline: Used for 3 months wouldn't recommend
reviews.comments: Purchased for dark circles and made part of my skin care routine for three months. I did not notice any difference at all from start to finish of product. Wouldn't buy again.

reviews.headline: Did not work
reviews.comments: the first 3 days of using it, it worked great but after those 3 days my dark circle started getting darker instead of light even if i put more product

reviews.headline: Did not work
reviews.comments: the first 3 days of using it, it worked great but after those 3 days my dark circle started getting darker instead of light even if i put more product

reviews.headline: No results
reviews.comments: I used this day & night for 2 weeks. Although it was moisturizing, it did nothing to reduce wrinkles, bags or dark circles. I have used many CeraVe products and normally love this brand. I decided to take it back.

reviews.headline: No results
reviews.comments: I used this day & night for 2 weeks. Although it was moisturizing, it did nothing to reduce wrinkles, bags or dark circles. I have used many CeraVe products and normally love this brand. I decided to take it back.

reviews.headline: Love how it feels
reviews.comments: Love how this feels on my skin.

reviews.headline: BEWARE. Creates Milia
reviews.comments: I would use this during the day, since my other eye cream has retinol, and I didn't want to have retinol on my undereyes during the day. Yes, it's moisturizing, but now my undereyes are covered in milia! It doesn't matter how much/little I used, it just created more! So mad that I wasted my money on this and now have to suffer woth noticable bumps.

reviews.headline: I loooove CeraVe
reviews.comments:
Cerave was reccomended to me by two different dermatologists and I've been using their other products for years and started using this in the last couple of years and have repurchased a few times. I used to have pretty bad under eye circles but I feel like it has seriously helped over time. I don't feel the need to even wear concealer anymore. 
I have super senstive post-isotretion skin by the way!

reviews.headline: great buy
reviews.comments: it worked well for me i will purchase it again

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Seems to be helping dark circles

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comments: While I normally love CeraVe products (I use their cleanser everyday) this eye cream does not work AT ALL. It moisturizes, sure. But as for getting rid of the dark circles? No. I just took a picture and saw my under eye dark circles are actually worse!!!!! Will be buying a different product

reviews.headline: Cera Eye Repair Cream
reviews.comments: This eye cream burned when I put it under my eyes.  Very disappointing.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Dont wait go now

reviews.headline: Buying again, I missed it
reviews.comments: I used this cream exclusively until the tube was almost gone not thinking anything of it. Then I switched to something else and was wondering why I was looking so tired all the time. It only dawned on me when I found this old,almost empty,tube.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This product is amazing and does exactly what it claims! Probably my favorite of all the CeraVe line.

Really the dark circle relief and puffiness relief in the morning is what impressed me, I've been using it only a week and a half, so I'm still waiting for the darker circles at my inner eye to fade with further use. Already the main portion of my dark circles have faded to invisibility.

I use this product everyday once in the Morning and once at Night. I spread it along the orbital bone as my dermatologist instructed (VERY IMPORTANT, and the cream will reach the rest of the undereye area from the orbital bone area, don't worry) which will prevent the bumps/breakouts some people report using this (bumps/breakouts comes from getting it in the eye/tear duct itself, though it's possible some reviewers were just allergic so always patch test!). I also use the cream on my top lid because I have some dark/brown discoloration there and it seems to be helping that fade as well.

It's disappeared most of my dark circles almost completely and I can tell the skin under my eye isn't so thin anymore--I get itchy eyes a lot so the skin around my eye has thinned out and this product has countered that and started to restore the healthiness to the skin around my eye.

The only warning about this product I'd give is that it can sometimes mildly burn if the skin around your eye is thin--the burning will go away once you use this for awhile as it thickens the skin around your eye. It also burns pretty bad if you get it in your eye, so pleaseplease avoid that! And again only apply under the eye by feeling around the orbital bone (that bone under your eye) to avoid getting it in your eye and causing irritation to the eye, or worse, in some peoples' case, breakouts and bumps.

The only other complaint I have is that I wish they gave you more cream for the price. It's still a fair price, though, considering how well it works. But I've recommended this to a friend and will continue to do so with everyone I know who struggles with eye discoloration, puffiness in the morning and/or thinness of the skin around the eye.
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect for Dark Circles

faceoff_negative.comments:
I used this product twice a day for a full month. To be fair, you should know I'm 41 and have that dreaded crepey under eye area. Here's my two cents:

I love that this cream comes in a tube because it makes the application very easy.  The only con to this is that I have no idea how much product is still in there after a month's use.  It still feels like there's quite a bit left, though.

The cream is a nice, thick formula and blends quickly and smoothly into the skin.  I usually wait about 5 minutes for it to sink in before applying my makeup, and I have no problem with smudging.

Overall, it's a good product for the price.  Considering the reputation of the brand and the fact that this cream contains hyaluronic acid, I was expecting better results.  While it moisturizes well, it didn't deliver on repairing and restoring my under eye area.
faceoff_negative.headline: Moisturizes but doesn't repair...
